snippet.title: Cities In Motion 2 - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the game: http://www.citiesinmotion2.com/buy

Cities in Motion 2, the transit simulation and design game for PC and Mac from Colossal Order Ltd. Cities in Motion 2 will challenge players with the task of designing, building, and maintaining an efficient and affordable mass transit network for a variety of growing, dynamic cities.

More info: 
Webpage: http://www.citiesinmotion2.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/citiesinmotion
Twitter:  http://twitter.com/Citiesinmotion
